purpose: To present strategies for improving long-term spend potential.
title: Make adjustments to activation and spend operations by looking at long-term spend forecast

bullets.text: What’s the long-term spend forecast for the customers we’ve acquired in recent months? Is the forecasted spend growing?
Compared to our competitors, can our products attract better customers with higher spend potential?
Which merchant categories and channels should we focus on for the sign-up bonus?
After the customer makes their first purchase, which type of spend should we encourage in order to drive long-term spend potential effectively?
Use AIM to accurately forecast a customer’s long-term spend potential within 3 months after their first purchase.
Use network data to benchmark the issuer’s performance to same-class competitive products.
Analyze the causal relationship between first purchase behavior and long-term spend potential to help the issuer design sign-up campaigns that will attract high potential customers.
Analyze the causal relationship between early spend behavior and long-term spend potential to help the issuer manage EMOB customers with precision.
